hotelDetailsMakkah.name: Mövenpick Hilton Convention
hotelDetailsMakkah.description: Located within one of the tallest buildings in the world and overlooking the Holy Grand Mosque, Makkah Tower seamlessly combines traditional values with modern comfort. The property features on-site shopping facilities and fine dining options. Offering complimentary WiFi, rooms are decorated with contemporary wooden furnishings, with most rooms facing Masjid al-Haram and the sacred Ka'aba. All rooms are equipped with flat-screen satellite television, tea and coffee making facilities, and a minibar. Guests can enjoy gourmet Saudi specialties at the Al Naim restaurant and an array of international classics at the Al Firdaous buffet bistros. Al Diwan Tea Lounge serves Arabic coffee and selected tea blends.

hotelDetailsMadinah.name: Al-Aqeeq Madinah
hotelDetailsMadinah.description: Al-Aqeeq Madinah Hotel is located in Medina, just a few steps from the Holy Haram. Guests can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the property. Rooms provide flat-screen satellite television, air conditioning, and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also include a hairdryer and complimentary toiletries. Suites feature a living room. Room service is available 24 hours. At Al-Aqeeq Madinah, guests will find a 24-hour front desk and a mini-market on site. Other facilities include 2 restaurants, a coffee shop, and retail shops on the premises. The property offers on-site parking upon availability.

transportationServices: Complete private luxury transportation from Jeddah Airport to Makkah Hotel, Makkah Hotel to Madinah Hotel, and Madinah Hotel to Madinah Airport.

visaInformation.title: Saudi Tourist E-Visa
visaInformation.description: The E-Visa is a one-year, multiple-entry visa, allowing tourists to spend up to 90 days in the country. The tourist visa permits participation in tourism-related activities such as events, family and relatives visits, leisure, and Umrah (excluding Hajj) and excludes other activities such as studying.
